attributes.action: We, the public, ask that David Cameron MP remain as our Prime Minister
attributes.background: In 2015, the majority of the general public who were eligible to vote in the General Election, decided that a Conservative led government by David Cameron MP was the right thing for this country. We want Mr. Cameron to serve until at least 2020 to deliver his manifesto commitments.

rejection.details: The resignation of an individual Minister, including the Prime Minister, is not a decision for the Government or Parliament as a whole. It is a decision for the individual concerned. The UK Government or Parliament cannot stop a Minister resigning.
